explains: adv. 正确地；恰当地；公正地；合适地
wordGroup: rightly or wrongly [多用作插入语]且不管对还是错

sentences.en: The school was rightly proud of the excellent exam results.
sentences.cn: 学校为这次出色的考试成绩感到骄傲，这是理所当然的。

sentences.en: I can't rightly say what happened.
sentences.cn: 我说不准到底发生了什么事。

sentences.en: I don't rightly know where he's gone.
sentences.cn: 我说不好他上哪儿去了。
